Download

1. Download live image, checksums and checksum signature:

  • Tier 1 mirror
$ export URL='https://repo-default.voidlinux.org/live/current'
$ wget "${URL}/sha256sum.txt"
$ wget "${URL}/sha256sum.sig"
$ wget "${URL}/void-live-x86_64-<YYYYMMDD>.iso"

2. Download public signing key:

  • Void release keys
$ wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/void-linux/void-packages/master/srcpkgs/void-release-keys/files/void-release-<YYYYMMDD>.pub

3. Verify checksum authenticity and live image integrity: 

$ signify -V -p void-release-*.pub -x sha256sum.sig -m sha256sum.txt
$ sha256sum -c --ignore-missing sha256sum.txt void-live-x86_64-<YYYYMMDD>.iso
